itemDescription: English footballer who plays for Southport as a defender (born 1985)

wikipedia_page.main: James Smith (born 17 October 1985) is an English footballer who played for Southport, Altrincham, Stockport County and Telford United as a defender. He made over 30 appearances in the Scottish Football League and the Football League.
